title: Bridging the highways
creator_credit: Dorman Long & Co and John Byrd
brief_description: Steel bridges put together on site from prefabricated universal sections mean a saving in labour and greater speed in bridge constructions. The sections are despatched ready for erection to numerous sites all over modern motorway Britain.
description: Steel bridges put together on site from prefabricated universal sections mean a saving in labour and greater speed in bridge constructions. The sections are despatched ready for erection to numerous sites all over modern motorway Britain.
